Class BaseAuthenticationManager

com.google.enterprise.connector.spi.AuthenticationManager
public class BaseAuthenticationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.enterprise.connector.spi.AuthenticationManager

Class implementing the connectors AuthenticationManager interface of the connector. This class is called by the connector when it needs to authenticate a user
